article_title: Colorado wildfires, major fires from 1971-2013: Interactive graphic – The Denver Post
article_text: A selection of the best images of the day from around the country and across the world on Tuesday, May 24, 2016. Refinery workers stepped up strikes that threaten to paralyze France weeks ahead of the Euro 2016 tournament as the government moved to break their blockades, escalating a three-month tug-of-war over labour reforms. Refugees and other migrants boarding buses heading...
article_summary:
A selection of the best images of the day from around the country and across the world on Tuesday, May 24, 2016.
Refinery workers stepped up strikes that threaten to paralyze France weeks ahead of the Euro 2016 tournament as the government moved to break their blockades, escalating a three-month tug-of-war over labour reforms.
